text: “N’choipa zedi chimene asinthanitsira (chisangalalo cha tsiku lachimaliziro cha) mitima yawo pa kukana kwao zimene Allah adavumbulutsa, chifukwa cha njiru basi kuti Allah watsitsira chifundo chake amene wamfuna mwa akapolo Ake (amene sali Myuda). Potero adabwerera ndi mkwiyo wa Allah kuonjezera pa mkwiyo wakale. Ndipo osakhulupirira adzakhala ndi chilango chosambula
